original_title: Maximum Orgasm: The Man's Guide to Tantric Pleasure
overview: Maximum Orgasm, the follow up to the critically acclaimed Maximum Performance is a journey into the joys of Tantric solo sex. Tantra is an ancient Hindu belief that continually taking time to "worship" your sacred manhood and succumb to the joys of physical pleasure will lead you to true enlightenment. This program de-mystifies the Tantric ritual, presenting down to earth and erotic demonstrations of techniques for deeper physical pleasure.
tagline: The Secrets to the Ultimate Male Orgasm
title: Maximum Orgasm: The Man's Guide to Tantric Pleasure
